description.en: Bacterial wilt is caused by Ralstonia solanacearum, which blocks the vascular system of the plant, causing wilting and yellowing of leaves.
description.tl: Ang bacterial wilt ay dulot ng Ralstonia solanacearum, na humaharang sa vascular system ng halaman, na nagiging sanhi ng pagkalanta at paninilaw ng mga dahon.

tl: Biglaang paglanta ng mga dahon
Paninilaw at paglaylay ng mga dahon
Pagka-kayumanggi ng vascular tissue
Pagkamatay ng halaman sa loob ng 7-10 araw
Bacterial ooze mula sa mga pinutol na tangkay

en: Avoid injury to plants during cultivation
Remove and destroy infected plants immediately
Maintain proper spacing for air circulation
tl: Gumamit ng walang sakit na binhing ugat (rhizomes)
Pagbutihin ang drainage para maiwasan ang pagbaha
Iwasan ang pagka-sugat ng halaman habang nagsasaka
Alisin at sunugin agad ang may sakit na halaman
I-sterilize ang mga kasangkapan pagkatapos gamitin
Panatilihin ang tamang espasyo para sa daloy ng hangin

description.en: Rotate ginger with non-host crops like cereals or legumes for 3-4 years to break the disease cycle.
description.tl: Mag-rotate ng luya kasama ang ibang pananim tulad ng cereal o legumes sa loob ng 3-4 taon upang maputol ang ikot ng sakit.

application.en: Plant non-susceptible crops in infected areas
application.tl: Magtanim ng hindi madaling tamaan ng sakit sa mga apektadong lugar

timing.tl: Bago ang panahon ng pagtatanim

description.en: Apply neem cake to soil to suppress bacterial populations and improve soil health.
description.tl: Maglagay ng neem cake sa lupa para sugpuin ang bakterya at pagbutihin ang kalusugan ng lupa.

application.en: Mix 200-250 kg neem cake per hectare into soil before planting
application.tl: Haluin ang 200-250 kg neem cake bawat ektarya sa lupa bago magtanim

timing.tl: 2-3 linggo bago magtanim

description.en: Bio-control agent that competes with pathogenic bacteria and enhances plant immunity.
description.tl: Bio-control agent na nakikipag-compete sa makasama na bakterya at nagpapalakas ng immunity ng halaman.

application.en: Mix 5 kg Trichoderma with 100 kg FYM and apply per hectare
application.tl: Haluin ang 5 kg Trichoderma sa 100 kg FYM at ilagay bawat ektarya

timing.tl: Sa pagtatanim at bawat buwan

description.en: Plant disease-resistant ginger varieties if available in your region.
description.tl: Magtanim ng uri ng luya na lumalaban sa sakit kung mayroon sa inyong lugar.

application.en: Source certified disease-free rhizomes from reputable suppliers
application.tl: Kumuha ng sertipikadong walang sakit na ugat mula sa maaasahang supplier

timing.tl: Sa pagtatanim

description.en: Use solar heat to kill soil-borne bacteria before planting.
description.tl: Gamitin ang init ng araw para patayin ang bakterya sa lupa bago magtanim.

application.en: Cover moist soil with transparent plastic for 4-6 weeks in hot season
application.tl: Takpan ang basang lupa ng malinaw na plastic ng 4-6 na linggo sa tag-init

timing.tl: 1-2 buwan bago magtanim

description.en: Antibiotic spray effective against bacterial wilt.
description.tl: Antibiotic spray na epektibo laban sa bacterial wilt.

application.en: Spray 500 ppm (0.5 g/L) streptocycline solution. Drench soil around infected plants.
application.tl: Mag-spray ng 500 ppm (0.5 g/L) streptocycline solution. Buhusan ang lupa sa paligid ng may sakit na halaman.

timing.en: At first sign of infection, repeat every 10-15 days
timing.tl: Sa unang palatandaan ng sakit, ulitin bawat 10-15 araw

safety_precautions.en: Wear protective gear. Observe withdrawal period before harvest.
safety_precautions.tl: Magsuot ng protective gear. Sundin ang withdrawal period bago mag-ani.

description.en: Broad-spectrum bactericide for preventive and curative control.
description.tl: Broad-spectrum bactericide para sa pag-iwas at paggamot.

application.en: Spray 0.3% copper oxychloride (3 g/L) solution on foliage and soil drench
application.tl: Mag-spray ng 0.3% copper oxychloride (3 g/L) solution sa dahon at buhusan ang lupa

timing.en: Preventive sprays every 15-20 days during monsoon
timing.tl: Pag-spray para sa pag-iwas bawat 15-20 araw tuwing tag-ulan

safety_precautions.en: Avoid spraying during hot weather. Maintain 15-day pre-harvest interval.
safety_precautions.tl: Iwasan ang pag-spray sa mainit na panahon. Sundin ang 15-araw na interval bago mag-ani.

description.en: Disinfect soil to reduce bacterial load in heavily infected areas.
description.tl: I-disinfect ang lupa para bawasan ang bakterya sa mga lugar na lubhang apektado.

application.en: Apply 250 kg bleaching powder per hectare and incorporate into soil
application.tl: Maglagay ng 250 kg bleaching powder bawat ektarya at haluin sa lupa

timing.tl: 2-3 linggo bago magtanim

safety_precautions.en: Avoid direct contact with skin. Water soil after application.
safety_precautions.tl: Iwasan ang direktang contact sa balat. Diliguan ang lupa pagkatapos gamitin.

description.en: Rhizome rot is caused by Pythium spp. and other fungi, leading to water-soaked lesions and decay of underground rhizomes.
description.tl: Ang pagkabulok ng ugat ay dulot ng Pythium spp. at iba pang fungus, na nagiging sanhi ng basang-basa na sugat at pagkabulok ng ugat sa ilalim ng lupa.

en: Soft, mushy texture of affected rhizomes
Yellowing and wilting of aerial parts
Brown to black discoloration of rhizome
tl: Basang-basa na sugat sa mga ugat
Malambot at malagkit na textura ng apektadong ugat
Mabahong amoy mula sa bulok na bahagi
Paninilaw at paglanta ng mga bahaging nasa ibabaw
Pagka-kayumanggi hanggang pag-itim ng ugat

en: Practice crop rotation with non-host crops
Remove infected rhizomes and destroy them
tl: Pumili ng lugar na may magandang drainage para sa pagtatanim
Gumamit ng sertipikadong walang sakit na pananim
Iwasan ang sobrang pag-dilig at pagbaha
Mag-practice ng crop rotation kasama ng ibang pananim
Alisin at sunugin ang mga may sakit na ugat
Panatilihin ang tamang soil pH (5.5-6.5)

description.en: Biocontrol fungus that parasitizes pathogenic fungi and promotes plant health.
description.tl: Biocontrol fungus na kumakain sa makasama na fungus at nagpapalakas ng kalusugan ng halaman.

application.en: Treat seed rhizomes with Trichoderma suspension (10 g/L) for 30 minutes before planting
application.tl: Ibabad ang binhing ugat sa Trichoderma suspension (10 g/L) ng 30 minuto bago itanim

timing.en: Before planting and as soil drench monthly
timing.tl: Bago magtanim at buhusan ang lupa bawat buwan

description.en: Beneficial bacteria that suppress soil-borne pathogens.
description.tl: Mabuting bakterya na sumusupo sa mga sakit na galing sa lupa.

application.en: Rhizome treatment with 10 g/L suspension for 30 minutes. Soil application at 5 kg/ha with FYM
application.tl: Ibabad ang ugat sa 10 g/L suspension ng 30 minuto. Ilagay sa lupa ang 5 kg/ha kasama ng FYM

timing.en: At planting and 45-60 days after planting
timing.tl: Sa pagtatanim at 45-60 araw pagkatapos magtanim

description.en: Alkaline wood ash creates unfavorable conditions for fungal growth.
description.tl: Ang alkaline na abo ay lumilikha ng hindi magandang kondisyon para sa paglaki ng fungus.

application.en: Dust seed rhizomes with wood ash before planting. Apply 2-3 tons/ha to soil
application.tl: Budburan ng abo ang binhing ugat bago itanim. Maglagay ng 2-3 tonelada/ektarya sa lupa

timing.tl: Sa pagtatanim

description.en: Antifungal properties of neem help control fungal infections.
description.tl: Ang antifungal properties ng neem ay tumutulong kontrolin ang fungal infection.

application.en: Spray 3-5% neem oil solution on foliage and as soil drench
application.tl: Mag-spray ng 3-5% neem oil solution sa dahon at buhusan ang lupa

timing.tl: Bawat dalawang linggo habang lumalaki ang halaman

description.en: Proper drainage prevents waterlogging, reducing fungal infection risk.
description.tl: Ang tamang drainage ay pumipigil sa pagbaha, na binabawasan ang panganib ng fungal infection.

application.en: Plant on raised beds (15-20 cm height). Install drainage channels.
application.tl: Magtanim sa mataas na gulayan (15-20 cm taas). Gumawa ng drainage channels.

timing.tl: Bago magtanim

description.en: Contact fungicide effective against Pythium and other fungi.
description.tl: Contact fungicide na epektibo laban sa Pythium at iba pang fungus.

application.en: Treat rhizomes with 0.3% mancozeb (3 g/L) for 30 min. Soil drench at 0.25%
application.tl: Ibabad ang ugat sa 0.3% mancozeb (3 g/L) ng 30 minuto. Buhusan ang lupa ng 0.25%

timing.en: Before planting and as preventive spray every 15 days
timing.tl: Bago magtanim at mag-spray bawat 15 araw para sa pag-iwas

safety_precautions.en: Wear mask and gloves. Maintain 15-day pre-harvest interval.
safety_precautions.tl: Magsuot ng mask at gloves. Sundin ang 15-araw na interval bago mag-ani.

description.en: Systemic and contact fungicide combination for better control.
description.tl: Kombinasyon ng systemic at contact fungicide para sa mas mahusay na kontrol.

application.en: Rhizome treatment: 2.5 g/L for 20-30 min. Foliar spray: 2 g/L every 10-15 days
application.tl: Ibabad ang ugat: 2.5 g/L ng 20-30 minuto. Mag-spray sa dahon: 2 g/L bawat 10-15 araw

timing.en: At planting and during rainy season
timing.tl: Sa pagtatanim at sa panahon ng tag-ulan

safety_precautions.en: Use protective equipment. Follow label instructions strictly.
safety_precautions.tl: Gumamit ng protective equipment. Sundin ng tama ang instructions sa label.

description.en: Traditional copper-based fungicide for protective action.
description.tl: Tradisyonal na copper-based fungicide para sa proteksyon.

application.en: Spray 1% Bordeaux mixture (10 g copper sulfate + 10 g lime per liter)
application.tl: Mag-spray ng 1% Bordeaux mixture (10 g copper sulfate + 10 g apog bawat litro)

timing.en: Monthly applications starting from 2 months after planting
timing.tl: Bawat buwan simula sa 2 buwan pagkatapos magtanim

safety_precautions.en: Prepare fresh mixture. Avoid during hot sunny days.
safety_precautions.tl: Gumawa ng sariwang mixture. Iwasan sa mainit at maaraw na araw.

description.en: Broad-spectrum protectant fungicide.
description.tl: Broad-spectrum protectant fungicide.

application.en: Dust rhizomes with 2% captan powder or dip in 0.2% suspension
application.tl: Budburan ang ugat ng 2% captan powder o ibabad sa 0.2% suspension

timing.tl: Bago magtanim

safety_precautions.en: Avoid inhalation. Wear protective gear during application.
safety_precautions.tl: Iwasan ang paglanghap. Magsuot ng protective gear habang ginagamit.

description.en: Leaf spot is caused by Phyllosticta zingiberi, creating small brown spots with yellow halos on leaves, reducing photosynthesis.
description.tl: Ang batik sa dahon ay dulot ng Phyllosticta zingiberi, na lumilikha ng maliliit na kayumangging batik na may dilaw na paligid sa mga dahon, na binabawasan ang photosynthesis.

en: Spots may coalesce forming larger patches
Premature leaf drop in severe cases
tl: Maliliit na kayumangging batik sa mga dahon
Dilaw na paligid sa mga batik
Ang mga batik ay maaaring magsama at lumaki
Maagang paglagas ng dahon sa malalang kaso
Pagbaba ng lakas at ani ng halaman

en: Plant in well-ventilated areas with good air circulation
Avoid overhead irrigation; use drip irrigation
tl: Magtanim sa lugar na may magandang bentilasyon at daloy ng hangin
Iwasan ang overhead irrigation; gumamit ng drip irrigation
Panatilihin ang tamang espasyo ng halaman (20-25 cm)
Alisin ang mga damo ng regular
Iwasan ang paggawa sa basang bukid
Gumamit ng walang sakit na pananim

description.en: Natural antifungal properties help control leaf spot.
description.tl: Ang natural na antifungal properties ay tumutulong kontrolin ang batik sa dahon.

application.en: Blend 100g garlic with 1L water, strain, dilute 1:10 and spray on foliage
application.tl: Haluin ang 100g bawang sa 1L tubig, salain, dilute 1:10 at i-spray sa dahon

timing.en: Weekly applications at first sign of disease
timing.tl: Bawat linggo sa unang palatandaan ng sakit

description.en: Alkaline spray creates unfavorable conditions for fungal growth.
description.tl: Ang alkaline spray ay lumilikha ng hindi magandang kondisyon para sa paglaki ng fungus.

application.en: Mix 5g baking soda + 5ml oil + 1L water. Spray on both sides of leaves
application.tl: Haluin ang 5g baking soda + 5ml langis + 1L tubig. I-spray sa magkabilang gilid ng dahon

timing.tl: Bawat 7-10 araw bilang pag-iwas

description.en: Antifungal neem oil with spreading agent for better coverage.
description.tl: Antifungal neem oil na may spreading agent para sa mas magandang coverage.

application.en: Mix 10ml neem oil + 5ml liquid soap in 1L water. Spray thoroughly
application.tl: Haluin ang 10ml neem oil + 5ml liquid sabon sa 1L tubig. I-spray ng maayos

timing.en: Fortnightly sprays starting from 45 days after planting
timing.tl: Bawat dalawang linggo simula sa 45 araw pagkatapos magtanim

description.en: Organic copper formulations provide protective action.
description.tl: Ang organikong copper formulations ay nagbibigay ng proteksyon.

application.en: Follow manufacturer's instructions for organic copper products
application.tl: Sundin ang instructions ng manufacturer para sa organikong copper products

timing.tl: Bawat 10-15 araw sa mahalumigmig na panahon

description.en: Remove infected leaves to reduce disease spread.
description.tl: Alisin ang may sakit na dahon para bawasan ang pagkalat ng sakit.

application.en: Remove and destroy spotted leaves. Keep field clean of debris
application.tl: Alisin at sunugin ang mga dahong may batik. Panatilihing malinis ang bukid

timing.tl: Regular na pagmamasid at pag-alis

description.en: Systemic fungicide effective against leaf spot pathogens.
description.tl: Systemic fungicide na epektibo laban sa leaf spot pathogens.

application.en: Spray 0.1% carbendazim (1 g/L) solution on foliage
application.tl: Mag-spray ng 0.1% carbendazim (1 g/L) solution sa dahon

timing.en: At first appearance, repeat every 15 days
timing.tl: Sa unang paglitaw, ulitin bawat 15 araw

safety_precautions.en: Wear protective clothing. Observe 15-day pre-harvest interval.
safety_precautions.tl: Magsuot ng protective clothing. Sundin ang 15-araw na interval bago mag-ani.

description.en: Broad-spectrum protective fungicide.
description.tl: Broad-spectrum protective fungicide.

application.en: Spray 0.25% mancozeb (2.5 g/L) solution covering all leaf surfaces
application.tl: Mag-spray ng 0.25% mancozeb (2.5 g/L) solution sa lahat ng ibabaw ng dahon

timing.en: Preventive sprays every 10-15 days during rainy season
timing.tl: Pag-spray para sa pag-iwas bawat 10-15 araw sa tag-ulan

safety_precautions.en: Use mask and gloves. Avoid spray drift.
safety_precautions.tl: Gumamit ng mask at gloves. Iwasan ang spray drift.

description.en: Systemic triazole fungicide with curative action.
description.tl: Systemic triazole fungicide na may curative action.

application.en: Spray 0.1% (1 ml/L) propiconazole solution
application.tl: Mag-spray ng 0.1% (1 ml/L) propiconazole solution

timing.en: At disease initiation, repeat after 20-25 days
timing.tl: Sa simula ng sakit, ulitin pagkatapos ng 20-25 araw

safety_precautions.en: Highly toxic. Use full protective gear. Follow label strictly.
safety_precautions.tl: Lubhang nakakalason. Gumamit ng full protective gear. Sundin ng tama ang label.

description.en: Broad-spectrum protectant fungicide.
description.tl: Broad-spectrum protectant fungicide.

application.en: Spray 0.2% chlorothalonil (2 g/L) solution
application.tl: Mag-spray ng 0.2% chlorothalonil (2 g/L) solution

timing.tl: Pag-gamit para sa pag-iwas bawat 15 araw

safety_precautions.en: Avoid contact with skin. Maintain pre-harvest interval.
safety_precautions.tl: Iwasan ang contact sa balat. Sundin ang pre-harvest interval.

description.en: Soft rot is primarily caused by Erwinia species, leading to rapid breakdown of plant tissues with characteristic foul odor.
description.tl: Ang malambot na bulok ay pangunahing dulot ng Erwinia species, na nagiging sanhi ng mabilis na pagkasira ng plant tissues na may mabahong amoy.

en: Strong foul odor from infected areas
tl: Basang-basa na sugat sa pseudostem
Malambot at malagkit na pagkabulok ng tissues
Malakas na mabahong amoy mula sa apektadong parte
Paninilaw at pagbagsak ng mga dahon
Bacterial ooze mula sa may sakit na tissues
Magtanim sa mataas na gulayan na may magandang drainage
Iwasan ang pagka-sugat ng halaman
Gumamit ng malusog at walang sakit na ugat
Panatilihing malinis ang bukid
Alisin at sunugin ang may sakit na halaman
I-sterilize ang mga kasangkapan pagkatapos gamitin
Iwasan ang sobrang nitrogen fertilization

description.en: Beneficial bacteria that suppress soft rot pathogens.
description.tl: Mabuting bakterya na sumusupo sa soft rot pathogens.

application.en: Spray 10 g/L Bacillus subtilis solution on plants and soil drench
application.tl: Mag-spray ng 10 g/L Bacillus subtilis solution sa halaman at buhusan ang lupa

timing.tl: Pag-gamit para sa pag-iwas bawat 15 araw

description.en: Oxidizing agent that kills bacteria on contact.
description.tl: Oxidizing agent na pumapatay ng bakterya sa contact.

application.en: Spray 3% hydrogen peroxide solution diluted 1:10 with water
application.tl: Mag-spray ng 3% hydrogen peroxide solution na diluted 1:10 sa tubig

timing.en: At first sign of infection, repeat every 5-7 days
timing.tl: Sa unang palatandaan ng sakit, ulitin bawat 5-7 araw

description.en: Natural antibacterial properties help prevent wound infection.
description.tl: Ang natural na antibacterial properties ay tumutulong pigilan ang infection sa sugat.

application.en: Dust cinnamon powder on wounds and cut surfaces during harvesting
application.tl: Budburan ng pulbos ng kanela ang mga sugat at pinutol na bahagi habang nag-aani

timing.en: After any mechanical injury or during harvest
timing.tl: Pagkatapos ng anumang pinsala o habang nag-aani

description.en: Contains compounds with antibacterial activity.
description.tl: May mga compounds na may antibacterial activity.

application.en: Soak 1 kg mustard cake in 10L water for 24h, filter and spray
application.tl: Ibabad ang 1 kg mustard cake sa 10L tubig ng 24 oras, salain at i-spray

timing.tl: Bawat linggong pag-gamit bilang pag-iwas

description.en: Cultural methods to reduce infection risk.
description.tl: Mga paraan ng pagsasaka para bawasan ang panganib ng infection.

application.en: Avoid injuries, improve drainage, remove infected plants immediately
application.tl: Iwasan ang pinsala, pagbutihin ang drainage, alisin agad ang may sakit na halaman

timing.tl: Sa buong panahon ng paglaki

description.en: Combination of antibiotic and bactericide for enhanced control.
description.tl: Kombinasyon ng antibiotic at bactericide para sa mas mahusay na kontrol.

application.en: Mix streptocycline (100 ppm) with copper oxychloride (0.3%). Spray and soil drench
application.tl: Haluin ang streptocycline (100 ppm) sa copper oxychloride (0.3%). Mag-spray at buhusan ang lupa

timing.en: At first symptoms, repeat every 10 days
timing.tl: Sa unang sintomas, ulitin bawat 10 araw

safety_precautions.en: Wear protective gear. Follow resistance management practices.
safety_precautions.tl: Magsuot ng protective gear. Sundin ang resistance management practices.

description.en: Fixed copper bactericide with good residual activity.
description.tl: Fixed copper bactericide na may magandang residual activity.

application.en: Spray 0.3% copper hydroxide (3 g/L) solution
application.tl: Mag-spray ng 0.3% copper hydroxide (3 g/L) solution

timing.en: Preventive sprays every 15 days during wet season
timing.tl: Pag-spray para sa pag-iwas bawat 15 araw sa basang panahon

safety_precautions.en: Avoid phytotoxicity by not spraying in very hot weather.
safety_precautions.tl: Iwasan ang phytotoxicity sa pag-iwas ng pag-spray sa sobrang init.

description.en: Antibiotic effective against gram-positive and gram-negative bacteria.
description.tl: Antibiotic na epektibo laban sa gram-positive at gram-negative bacteria.

application.en: Spray 500 ppm tetracycline solution (0.5 g/L)
application.tl: Mag-spray ng 500 ppm tetracycline solution (0.5 g/L)

timing.en: At infection onset, repeat every 7-10 days
timing.tl: Sa simula ng infection, ulitin bawat 7-10 araw

safety_precautions.en: Use as last resort. Observe proper withdrawal period.
safety_precautions.tl: Gamitin bilang huling paraan. Sundin ang tamang withdrawal period.

en: Yellowing of lower leaves progressing upward
tl: Paninilaw ng mga ibabang dahon na umaangat pataas
Paglaylay at paglanta ng mga dahon
Pagka-kayumanggi ng vascular tissue
Pagka-pandak ng paglaki
Pagkamatay ng halaman sa malalang kaso
Gumamit ng matitigas o tolerant na uri

Gumamit ng walang sakit na binhing ugat
Panatilihin ang tamang drainage

Alisin at sunugin ang may sakit na halaman

description.en: Aggressive biocontrol fungus effective against Fusarium.
description.tl: Agresibong biocontrol fungus na epektibo laban sa Fusarium.

application.tl: Ibabad ang ugat sa 10 g/L suspension. Maglagay ng 5 kg/ha kasama ng FYM

timing.en: Before planting and at 45, 90 days after planting
timing.tl: Bago magtanim at sa 45, 90 araw pagkatapos magtanim

description.en: Biocontrol agent that produces antifungal metabolites.

application.en: Apply 5 kg/ha Aspergillus niger formulation with organic matter
application.tl: Maglagay ng 5 kg/ha Aspergillus niger formulation kasama ng organic matter

timing.tl: Ilagay sa lupa bago magtanim

name.tl: Pataba mula sa Hayop + Neem Cake

description.en: Improves soil health and suppresses pathogenic fungi.
description.tl: Nagpapabuti ng kalusugan ng lupa at sumusupo sa makasama na fungus.

application.en: Apply 20-25 tons FYM + 1 ton neem cake per hectare
application.tl: Maglagay ng 20-25 tonelada FYM + 1 tonelada neem cake bawat ektarya

timing.tl: 2-3 linggo bago magtanim

description.en: Curcumin has antifungal properties against Fusarium.
description.tl: Ang curcumin ay may antifungal properties laban sa Fusarium.

application.en: Soak 100g turmeric powder in 1L water overnight, filter, dilute 1:5 and spray
application.tl: Ibabad ang 100g luyang dilaw powder sa 1L tubig magdamag, salain, dilute 1:5 at i-spray

timing.tl: Bawat dalawang linggo

application.en: Cover moist soil with transparent plastic for 6 weeks in summer
application.tl: Takpan ang basang lupa ng malinaw na plastic ng 6 linggo sa tag-init

timing.tl: 2 buwan bago magtanim

description.en: Systemic benzimidazole fungicide effective against Fusarium.
description.tl: Systemic benzimidazole fungicide na epektibo laban sa Fusarium.

application.tl: Ibabad ang ugat: 0.2% (2 g/L) ng 30 minuto. Buhusan ang lupa: 0.1%

timing.en: Before planting and as drench every 30 days
timing.tl: Bago magtanim at buhusan bawat 30 araw

safety_precautions.tl: Magsuot ng gloves at mask. Iwasan ang kontaminasyon ng tubigan.

description.en: Systemic fungicide with preventive and curative action.

timing.en: At first symptoms, repeat every 20-25 days

safety_precautions.en: Use protective equipment. Observe pre-harvest interval.
safety_precautions.tl: Gumamit ng protective equipment. Sundin ang pre-harvest interval.

application.en: Soil drench with 0.1% (1 ml/L) solution around plant base

timing.en: Preventive application at 60 and 120 days after planting

safety_precautions.en: Highly toxic. Follow label instructions strictly.
safety_precautions.tl: Lubhang nakakalason. Sundin ng tama ang label instructions.

application.en: Rhizome treatment: 0.1% (1 ml/L) for 30 min. Foliar spray: 0.05%

safety_precautions.tl: Gumamit ng protective gear. Iwasan ang spray drift.

description.en: Root knot nematode (Meloidogyne spp.) attacks roots forming galls, reducing nutrient and water uptake, causing stunting and yield loss.
description.tl: Ang bukol sa ugat (Meloidogyne spp.) ay umaatake sa mga ugat at bumubuo ng bukol, na binabawasan ang pagkuha ng sustansya at tubig, na nagiging sanhi ng pagka-pandak at pagbaba ng ani.

en: Galls or knots on roots and rhizomes
tl: Bukol o buhol sa mga ugat
Pandak at nanilaw na halaman
Paglanta kahit sapat ang tubig
Pagliit ng ugat at pagbaba ng kalidad
Kakaunting sanga

en: Practice crop rotation with non-host crops (cereals, pulses)
Hot water treatment of rhizomes (51C for 10 minutes)
Deep summer ploughing to expose nematodes to sun
Avoid movement of soil/equipment from infected fields
tl: Gumamit ng sertipikadong walang nematode na pananim
Mag-practice ng crop rotation kasama ng ibang pananim (cereal, pulses)
Hot water treatment ng ugat (51C ng 10 minuto)
Malalim na pag-araro sa tag-init para mailantad ang nematode sa araw
Iwasan ang paglipat ng lupa/kagamitan mula sa apektadong bukid
Panatilihing malinis ang bukid
Magtanim ng tolerant na uri kung mayroon

description.en: Nematophagous fungus that parasitizes nematode eggs.
description.tl: Nematophagous fungus na kumakain sa itlog ng nematode.

application.en: Apply 5 kg/ha Paecilomyces formulation mixed with FYM or compost
application.tl: Maglagay ng 5 kg/ha Paecilomyces formulation na halo sa FYM o compost

timing.en: At planting and 60 days after planting
timing.tl: Sa pagtatanim at 60 araw pagkatapos magtanim

description.en: Releases compounds toxic to nematodes and improves soil health.
description.tl: Naglalabas ng mga compounds na nakakalason sa nematode at nagpapabuti ng kalusugan ng lupa.

application.en: Apply 1-2 tons neem cake per hectare, incorporate into soil
application.tl: Maglagay ng 1-2 tonelada neem cake bawat ektarya, haluin sa lupa

timing.tl: 3 linggo bago magtanim

description.en: Marigold attracts nematodes but doesn't allow reproduction.
description.tl: Ang marigold ay umaakitin ang nematode pero hindi pinapayagan na magparami.

application.en: Plant African marigold as border crop or intercrop every 4-5 rows
application.tl: Magtanim ng African marigold bilang border crop o intercrop bawat 4-5 hanay

timing.en: Along with ginger or as preceding crop
timing.tl: Kasama ng luya o bilang unang pananim

description.en: Produces toxic compounds and competes with nematodes.
description.tl: Gumagawa ng nakakalasong compounds at nakikipag-compete sa nematode.

application.en: Rhizome treatment: 10 g/L for 30 min. Soil application: 5 kg/ha with FYM
application.tl: Ibabad ang ugat: 10 g/L ng 30 minuto. Ilagay sa lupa: 5 kg/ha kasama ng FYM

timing.en: Before planting and at 45 days after planting
timing.tl: Bago magtanim at sa 45 araw pagkatapos magtanim

description.en: High organic matter supports beneficial organisms that suppress nematodes.
description.tl: Ang mataas na organic matter ay sumusuporta sa mabuting organisms na sumusupo sa nematode.

application.en: Apply 25-30 tons well-decomposed FYM or compost per hectare
application.tl: Maglagay ng 25-30 tonelada ng mabuting nabubulok na FYM o compost bawat ektarya

timing.tl: 2-4 linggo bago magtanim

description.en: Contains ricinine, toxic to nematodes.
description.tl: May ricinine na nakakalason sa nematode.

application.en: Apply 500-750 kg castor cake per hectare, incorporate into soil
application.tl: Maglagay ng 500-750 kg castor cake bawat ektarya, haluin sa lupa

timing.tl: 3 linggo bago magtanim

description.en: Systemic nematicide and insecticide granules.
description.tl: Systemic nematicide at insecticide granules.

application.en: Apply 30-40 kg Carbofuran 3G per hectare at planting, incorporate into soil
application.tl: Maglagay ng 30-40 kg Carbofuran 3G bawat ektarya sa pagtatanim, haluin sa lupa

timing.tl: Sa panahon ng pagtatanim

safety_precautions.en: Highly toxic. Wear gloves. Do not use bare hands. Being phased out in many countries.
safety_precautions.tl: Lubhang nakakalason. Magsuot ng gloves. Huwag gumamit ng hubad na kamay. Tinatanggal na sa maraming bansa.

description.en: Organophosphate nematicide with systemic action.
description.tl: Organophosphate nematicide na may systemic action.

application.en: Apply 10-15 kg Phorate 10G per hectare in furrows before planting
application.tl: Maglagay ng 10-15 kg Phorate 10G bawat ektarya sa mga furrows bago magtanim

timing.tl: Sa pagtatanim

safety_precautions.en: Highly toxic. Use protective equipment. Avoid skin contact. Restricted in many regions.
safety_precautions.tl: Lubhang nakakalason. Gumamit ng protective equipment. Iwasan ang contact sa balat. Restricted sa maraming lugar.

description.en: Nereistoxin analogue with nematicidal activity.
description.tl: Nereistoxin analogue na may nematicidal activity.

application.en: Apply 10-12 kg Cartap 4G per hectare at planting
application.tl: Maglagay ng 10-12 kg Cartap 4G bawat ektarya sa pagtatanim

timing.en: At planting and 60 days after planting
timing.tl: Sa pagtatanim at 60 araw pagkatapos magtanim

safety_precautions.en: Moderately toxic. Wear protective gear.
safety_precautions.tl: Katamtamang nakakalason. Magsuot ng protective gear.

description.en: Soil fumigant that releases methylisothiocyanate.
description.tl: Soil fumigant na naglalabas ng methylisothiocyanate.

application.en: Apply 300-400 kg/ha, incorporate 15-20 cm deep, cover with plastic for 2 weeks
application.tl: Maglagay ng 300-400 kg/ha, haluin 15-20 cm na lalim, takpan ng plastic ng 2 linggo

timing.tl: 4-6 linggo bago magtanim

safety_precautions.en: Highly toxic gas. Professional application recommended. Clear area of people/animals.
safety_precautions.tl: Lubhang nakakalasong gas. Inirerekomenda ang professional application. Alisin ang mga tao/hayop sa lugar.

description.en: Preventive measures and best practices to maintain healthy ginger plants and prevent disease occurrence.
description.tl: Mga hakbang para sa pag-iwas at pinakamahuhusay na gawi upang mapanatili ang malusog na luya at maiwasan ang sakit.

en: Select well-drained, fertile soil with pH 5.5-6.5
Treat seed rhizomes with biocontrol agents before planting
Ensure good drainage through raised beds
Mulch to conserve moisture and suppress weeds
Monitor regularly for pest and disease symptoms
Irrigate properly - avoid waterlogging and drought stress
Remove and destroy any infected plants immediately
Avoid working in wet fields to prevent disease spread
tl: Pumili ng may magandang drainage at mabunga ng lupa na may pH 5.5-6.5
Gumamit ng sertipikadong walang sakit na binhing ugat
Ibabad ang binhing ugat sa biocontrol agents bago itanim
Panatilihin ang tamang espasyo ng halaman (20-25 cm)
Siguraduhing may magandang drainage sa pamamagitan ng mataas na gulayan
Mag-practice ng crop rotation (3-4 taon)
Maglagay ng sapat na organic matter
Mag-mulch para mapanatili ang kahalumigmigan at sugpuin ang damo
Regular na subaybayan ang sintomas ng peste at sakit
Panatilihing malinis ang bukid
Mag-dilig ng tama - iwasan ang pagbaha at kakulangan ng tubig
Alisin at sunugin agad ang anumang may sakit na halaman
Iwasan ang paggawa sa basang bukid para maiwasan ang pagkalat ng sakit

description.en: Proper nutrition enhances plant immunity and disease resistance.
description.tl: Ang tamang nutrisyon ay nagpapalakas ng immunity ng halaman at paglaban sa sakit.

application.en: Apply 25-30 tons FYM + 60:50:120 kg NPK per hectare in split doses
application.tl: Maglagay ng 25-30 tonelada FYM + 60:50:120 kg NPK bawat ektarya sa split doses

timing.en: FYM before planting, NPK in 3-4 splits during growing season
timing.tl: FYM bago magtanim, NPK sa 3-4 na beses habang lumalaki

description.en: Beneficial microbes boost plant health and suppress pathogens.
description.tl: Ang mabuting microbes ay nagpapalakas ng kalusugan ng halaman at sumusupo sa pathogens.

application.en: Brew 1 kg compost in 10L water for 24h, strain and spray
application.tl: Timplahan ang 1 kg compost sa 10L tubig ng 24 oras, salain at i-spray

timing.tl: Bawat dalawang linggo sa buong panahon ng paglaki

description.en: Conserves moisture, regulates temperature, and suppresses weeds.
description.tl: Nag-iingat ng kahalumigmigan, nire-regulate ang temperatura, at sumusupo sa damo.

application.en: Apply 5-7 cm layer of organic mulch (leaves, straw, grass)
application.tl: Maglagay ng 5-7 cm na layer ng organic mulch (dahon, dayami, damo)

effectiveness.tl: Mataas para sa pangkalahatang kalusugan ng halaman

timing.en: After planting and replenish as needed
timing.tl: Pagkatapos magtanim at dagdagan kung kailangan

description.en: Liquid fertilizer with growth hormones and beneficial microbes.
description.tl: Liquid fertilizer na may growth hormones at mabuting microbes.

application.en: Dilute vermiwash 1:10 with water, spray on foliage or soil drench
application.tl: I-dilute ang vermiwash 1:10 sa tubig, i-spray sa dahon o buhusan ang lupa

effectiveness.tl: Katamtaman para sa lakas ng halaman

timing.tl: Bawat 15 araw habang lumalaki ang dahon

description.en: Corrects deficiencies and enhances plant immunity.
description.tl: Inaayos ang kakulangan at nagpapalakas ng immunity ng halaman.

application.en: Spray multi-micronutrient mixture (Zn, Fe, Mn, B) as per manufacturer's instructions
application.tl: Mag-spray ng multi-micronutrient mixture (Zn, Fe, Mn, B) ayon sa instructions ng manufacturer

timing.en: 3-4 sprays at 30-day intervals starting from 45 days after planting
timing.tl: 3-4 na pag-spray bawat 30 araw simula sa 45 araw pagkatapos magtanim

safety_precautions.en: Follow recommended doses. Over-application can cause toxicity.
safety_precautions.tl: Sundin ang inirerekomendang dosis. Ang sobrang paggamit ay maaaring maging nakakalason.

description.en: Improves nutrient uptake and stimulates plant growth.
description.tl: Nagpapabuti ng pagkuha ng sustansya at nag-udyok ng paglaki ng halaman.

application.en: Apply 0.1-0.2% humic acid solution as soil drench or foliar spray
application.tl: Maglagay ng 0.1-0.2% humic acid solution bilang buhos sa lupa o spray sa dahon

effectiveness.tl: Katamtaman para sa lakas ng halaman

timing.tl: Bawat buwang pag-gamit habang lumalaki

safety_precautions.en: Non-toxic but follow application guidelines.
safety_precautions.tl: Hindi nakakalason pero sundin ang application guidelines.
